DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating the status of an individual's vaccinations.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration._Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration.

Property.preferredDefinition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment.

Concepts.definition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A status indicating that an individual has not received any of the required vaccinations.

Concepts.definition: A status indicating that an individual has not received any of the required vaccinations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A status indicating that an individual has received some of the required vaccinations.

Concepts.definition: A status indicating that an individual has received some of the required vaccinations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A status indicating that an individual has received all the required vaccinations.

Concepts.definition: A status indicating that an individual has received all the required vaccinations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Active immunization where vaccine is administered for therapeutic or preventive purposes. This can include administration of immunopotentiating agents such as BCG vaccine and Corynebacterium parvum as well as biological response modifiers such as interferons, interleukins, and colony-stimulating factors in order to directly stimulate the immune system.

Concepts.definition: Administration of vaccines to stimulate the host's immune response. This includes any preparation intended for active immunological prophylaxis or treatment.
A condition or state at a particular time.
